cast.name: 卡门·伊莱克特拉 Carmen Electra

this_title: Manhunt: The Search for America's Most Gorgeous Male Model Season 1
introduction: Manhunt: The Search for America's Most Gorgeous Male Model is a reality television series hosted by Carmen Electra on the Bravo network. It follows a formula similar to UPN's America's Next Top Model, but with two differences. One, all the contestants are male, and two, there is a spy among the men. Also multiple contenders are voted off each time, unlike the single-elimination structure of America's Next Top Model. Jon Jonsson was the winner.As with other reality shows, the pasts of several contestants were surprising and even controversial. For example, photographs surfaced apparently of cast member Hunter, who had made numerous anti-gay comments on the show, stripping in a gay club.
foreign_title: Manhunt: The Search for America's Most Gorgeous Male Model Season 1
